Author: akira0245, Ori
Name: MidiBard 2
Description:
Bard performance using midi files or keyboard.
- Solo and ensemble mode support
- Text commands for instrument equip and switch
Supported by FFXIV Bards & Bands Community: discord.gg/ff14bard
Punchline:
Bard performance using midi files or keyboard.
Supported by FFXIV Bards & Bands Community: discord.gg/ff14bard
Changelog:
Lyrics: LRC file without lyrics is now supported for those only wish to post the title of your song.
No need to add an empty line of [00:00.00] at the beginning of the LRC file anymore, as the first line of lyric is now correctly processed.
